<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scion Transformation](/Feats.aspx?ID=2414) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=226" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 47 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You go into hibernation for 24 hours and perform a ritual dedicated to your ancestors, undergoing a one-time metamorphosis. You permanently gain the effects of [_enlarge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=102), and your maximum Hit Points increase by your level. The ritual transforms most of your gear to the appropriate size for your new body (though powerful items like [artifacts](/Traits.aspx?ID=253) or items strongly tied to their original size may not transform, at the GM's discretion).
name: Scion Transformation
